            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The purpose of this project was to create an assessment and reporting methodology for estuary health in Atlantic Canada. Project partners were based in the Outer Bay of Fundy, Inner Bay of Fundy, southern shore of Nova Scotia, northwestern Northumberland Strait, eastern Northumberland Strait and western Newfoundland, addressing estuary health in a uniform manner throughout the Atlantic region. 
The water quality data collected in the estuaries included nitrates and chlorophyll a. Sediments were analyzed for contaminants including pesticides; and a series of samples were taken and analyzed for fecal coliform bacteria. Secchi depths were measured at all monitoring sites and a depth profile of dissolved oxygen and salinity was completed each season to establish water quality stratification.</gco:CharacterString>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-99fy-8j65
notes:
The purpose of this project was to create an assessment and reporting methodology for estuary health in Atlantic Canada. Project partners were based in the Outer Bay of Fundy, Inner Bay of Fundy, southern shore of Nova Scotia, northwestern Northumberland Strait, eastern Northumberland Strait and western Newfoundland, addressing estuary health in a uniform manner throughout the Atlantic region. 
The water quality data collected in the estuaries included nitrates and chlorophyll a. Sediments were analyzed for contaminants including pesticides; and a series of samples were taken and analyzed for fecal coliform bacteria. Secchi depths were measured at all monitoring sites and a depth profile of dissolved oxygen and salinity was completed each season to establish water quality stratification.

notes_translated.en:
The purpose of this project was to create an assessment and reporting methodology for estuary health in Atlantic Canada. Project partners were based in the Outer Bay of Fundy, Inner Bay of Fundy, southern shore of Nova Scotia, northwestern Northumberland Strait, eastern Northumberland Strait and western Newfoundland, addressing estuary health in a uniform manner throughout the Atlantic region. 
The water quality data collected in the estuaries included nitrates and chlorophyll a. Sediments were analyzed for contaminants including pesticides; and a series of samples were taken and analyzed for fecal coliform bacteria. Secchi depths were measured at all monitoring sites and a depth profile of dissolved oxygen and salinity was completed each season to establish water quality stratification.
notes_translated.fr:
Le but de ce projet était de créer une méthodologie d'évaluation et de production de rapports sur la santé des estuaires du Canada atlantique. Les partenaires du projet étaient basés dans l'extérieur de la baie de Fundy, dans l'intérieur de la baie de Fundy, sur la rive sud de la Nouvelle-Écosse, dans le nord-ouest du détroit de Northumberland, dans l'est du détroit de Northumberland et dans l'ouest de Terre-Neuve, abordant la santé des estuaires de manière uniforme dans toute la région de l'Atlantique. 
Les données sur la qualité de l'eau recueillies dans les estuaires incluaient les nitrates et la chlorophylle a. Les sédiments ont été analysés pour détecter la présence de contaminants, notamment de pesticides, et une série d'échantillons ont été prélevés et analysés pour détecter la présence de coliformes fécaux. Les profondeurs de Secchi ont été mesurées sur tous les sites de surveillance et un profil de profondeur de l'oxygène dissous et de la salinité a été réalisé chaque saison afin d'établir une stratification de la qualité de l'eau.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: Monitoring results from select estuaries in the four Atlantic provinces

title_translated.en: Monitoring results from select estuaries in the four Atlantic provinces
title_translated.fr: Résultats de la surveillance dans certains estuaires des quatre provinces de l'Atlantique
